goal.name: Zombies eliminated
goal.desc: Total number of the living-dead that you have sent back underground by whatever means.
goal.icon: Total number of the living-dead that you have sent back underground by whatever means.

goal.name: Hangings
goal.desc: Number of towns which, in the end, just couldn't put up with your crap anymore.

goal.name: Deaths by Dehydration
goal.desc: Number of times you have died from dehydration. Yes indeed, it turns out water is important.

goal.name: Deaths by Infection
goal.desc: Number of deaths from generalised infection.
goal.icon: Number of deaths from generalised infection.

goal.name: Nights in the desert
goal.desc: Little walks you took outside from which you never returned.
goal.icon: Little walks you took outside from which you never returned.

goal.name: Dead in your bed
goal.desc: Grandma, what big teeth you have... GROAR!

goal.name: Deaths from withdrawal
goal.desc: Nights you didn't see the other side of, due to lack of drugs...

goal.name: Atomic deaths
goal.desc: Number of existences entirely vaporized by the all-powerful atom.
goal.icon: Number of existences entirely vaporized by the all-powerful atom..

title.name: Boom! When the reactor goes BOOM!!!

goal.name: Injuries
goal.desc: Number of mutilations or dismemberments which didn't quite cost you your life.

goal.name: Patch-Ups
goal.desc: Illnesses or injuries which you have been saved from, in-extremis.
goal.icon: Illnesses or injuries which you have been saved from, in-extremis.

goal.name: Cannibalism
goal.desc: Number of times you have dined on human flesh...
goal.icon: Number of times you have dined on human flesh...

goal.name: Breakages
goal.desc: Number of objects you have broken through your own clumsiness.

goal.name: Thefts
goal.desc: Number of objects you have stolen from your fellow residents (alive).
goal.icon: Number of objects you have stolen from your fellow residents (alive).

goal.name: Pillages
goal.desc: Objects prised from the still-warm clutches of your former friends.
goal.icon: Objects prised from the still-warm clutches of your former friends.

goal.name: Home Improvements
goal.desc: Number of DIY projects succesfully completed around the house.

goal.name: Heroic actions
goal.desc: Number of truly extraordinary things you've done.
goal.icon: Number of truly extraordinary things you've done.

title.name: They named a constellation after me

goal.name: Distant Discoveries
goal.desc: Number of buildings you have explored in far-flung zones.
goal.icon: Number of buildings you have explored in far-flung zones.

title.name: I've been round the world... Twice!
I've even dug through a public toilet!

goal.name: Expert Expeditions
goal.desc: Number of buildings explored in EXTREMELY far away places.
goal.icon: Number of buildings explored in EXTREMELY far away places.

title.name: Indiana Jones and the ruins of the World Beyond

goal.name: Professional Scout
goal.desc: Days spent in the shadows as a Scout.
goal.icon: Days spent in the shadows as a Scout.

title.name: Taught Sam Fisher everything he knows!
I think you are underestimating the sneakiness...

goal.name: Professional Guardian
goal.desc: Days spent shepherding the weak through the valleys of darkness and finding lost children!
goal.icon: Days spent behind your shield as a guardian.

goal.name: Professional Scavenger
goal.desc: Days spent as a scavenger, foraging around.
goal.icon: Days spent as a scavenger, foraging around.

goal.name: Professional Survivalist
goal.desc: Days spent as a survivalist, eating roots, worms and other such delicacies.
goal.icon: Days spent as a survivalist, eating anything that comes to hand.

goal.name: Professional Tamer
goal.desc: Days spent as a Tamer, torturing Labradoodles.
goal.icon: Days spent as a Tamer, torturing Labradoodles.

title.name: Dog food doesn't taste so bad

goal.name: Professional Technician
goal.desc: The number of days you've spent jiggling and fiddling with pointy tools.
goal.icon: The number of days you've spent jiggling and fiddling with pointy tools.

goal.name: Professional Shaman
goal.desc: Days spent trafficking the souls of the dead.
goal.icon: Days spent trafficking the souls of the dead.

goal.name: Luck
goal.desc: Number of large metal chests you have found in the World Beyond.
goal.icon: Number of large metal chests you have found in the World Beyond.

goal.name: Chainsaws
goal.desc: The number of chainsaws you have built.
goal.icon: The number of chainsaws you have built.

title.name: There ain't nothing I can't take this chainsaw to...

goal.name: Water Guns
goal.desc: The number of water-based toys you have built.
goal.icon: The number of water-based toys you have built.

goal.name: Battery Launcher Builder
goal.desc: The number of Battery Launchers you have built.
goal.icon: The number of Battery Launchers you have built.

title.name: There's a battery with your name on it...
Is it a bird? Is it a plane? No, it's the super battery launcher!
Amped up and ready to roll
Hey hey, wanna see my... Battery?

goal.name: Repairs
goal.desc: Number of broken items that you've repaired.
goal.icon: Number of broken items that you've repaired.

goal.name: Drug Tests
goal.desc: The number of times you have tested dangerous drugs... on yourself.
goal.icon: The number of times you have tested dangerous drugs... on yourself.

title.name: What do you mean these ain't skittles

goal.name: Wonder Constructions
goal.desc: The number of wonders you have constructed.
goal.icon: The number of wonders you have constructed.

title.name: The age of cathedrals is upon us
Ain't y'all got nothin' else t'do?
High Priestess of the temple of the Sun

goal.name: Wonder: Statue of the Crow
goal.desc: The Crow is good, the Crow is all-powerful. [edited by the Crow]
goal.icon: The Crow is good, the Crow is all-powerful. [edited by the Crow]

goal.name: Wonder: Fearfulness Wheel
goal.desc: Look, I can see the zeds from up here!
goal.icon: Look, I can see the zeds from up here!

title.name: I can see the zeds from here!
There's gotta be 400 zombies salivating over us out there

goal.name: Wonder: Giant BRD
goal.desc: BRDs for everyone! The people demand BRDs
goal.icon: BRDs for everyone! The people demand BRDs!

title.name: BRDs for everyone! The people demand BRDs
It was smaller in the pictures
A little closer to the stars
Heavens! What will the neighbours say?

goal.name: Wonder: Sandcastle
goal.desc: You really built that?
goal.icon: You really built that?

title.name: Now that's a sand... Wait, what?
Permanant member of the sand club
I've got sand in places I didn't even know I had!

goal.name: Drugs
goal.desc: The number of funny little pills you have swallowed (or hidden elsewhere...).

goal.name: Alcohol
goal.desc: The number of litres of home-made alcoholic substances you have consumed.

title.name: Barney Gumble of the world beyond
Absinthe from drinking next time eh?!
Gimme a drink or the dog gets it!
If it's under 55 proof it's water!

goal.name: Messages
goal.desc: The number of worthwhile (or otherwise) messages you have left on the town forums.

goal.name: Masochism
goal.desc: The number of joyous moments in all this suffering.
goal.icon: The number of joyous moments in all this suffering.

goal.name: Butcher
goal.desc: The number of animals you have exterminated (by hand, with a mixer, with a saniflow macerator...).
goal.icon: The number of animals you have exterminated (by hand, with a mixer, with a saniflow macerator...).

title.name: If we're meant to eat vegetables, why are animals so tasty?

goal.name: Decoration
goal.desc: The number of decoration points you have taken the trouble to add to your dwelling place.
goal.icon: The number of decoration points you have taken the trouble to add to your dwelling place.

goal.name: Excavations
goal.desc: The number of action points you have invested in excavating ruins in the World Beyond.
goal.icon: The number of action points you have invested in excavating ruins in the World Beyond.

goal.name: Constructions
goal.desc: The number of action / construction points you have invested in the construction projects in town.
goal.icon: The number of action / construction points you have invested in the construction projects in town.

goal.name: Extreme Projects
goal.desc: The number of extreme projects you have carried out.
goal.icon: The number of extreme projects you have carried out.

title.name: I can recite pi to infinity!
And on the 7th day, he did not rest!

goal.name: Truly ludicrous projects
goal.desc: The number of truly ludicrous projects you've carried out.
goal.icon: The number of truly ludicrous projects you've carried out.

goal.name: In with the bricks
goal.desc: An extremely rare distinction, awarded only to the very earliest citizens of Die2Nite.
goal.icon: An extremely rare distinction, awarded only to the very earliest citizens of Die2Nite.

goal.name: Removals
goal.desc: The number of dead friends you've dragged out of the town.
goal.icon: The number of dead friends you've dragged out of the town.

goal.name: Sprinkler
goal.desc: The number of ceremonial showers given to corpses of citizens to ensure their non-return.
goal.icon: Ceremonial showers given to corpses of citizens to ensure their non-return.

goal.name: Fights of despair
goal.desc: The number of zombies you have killed with your bare hands, using no weapons or special abilities. Wow!
goal.icon: Zombies you have killed with your bare hands, using no weapons or special abilities. Wow!

title.name: Throwing zombies around like Strippers' bras!

goal.name: Banishments
goal.desc: The number of times you have been run out of town by a lynch mob.

goal.name: Last Man Standing
goal.desc: You were the last to die! Very few citizens have accomplished this feat!
goal.icon: You were the last to die ! Very few citizens have accomplished this feat!

goal.name: Last Man Standing - Hardcore!
goal.desc: You were the last to bite the bullet in a Hardcore town!
goal.icon: You were the last to bite the bullet in a Hardcore town!

title.name: Hell is a walk in the park.
I eat nails and sh*t bullets!

goal.name: Last line of defence
goal.desc: You were one of the last people to see the Hordes descend on the town...

title.name: The guard may perish, but he never gives up!
The second last of the Mohicans
All the way to the end and a bit further
Hello... Is there anybody out there?

goal.name: Extreme BBQ Chef
goal.desc: The number of former friends and fellow residents you have cooked and eaten.

goal.name: Craftsman
goal.desc: The number of objects you have assembled or dismantled at the workshop.

goal.name: Roleplayer
goal.desc: The number of documents and other uncovered 'roleplay' items.
goal.icon: The number of documents and other uncovered 'roleplay' items.

goal.name: Homemaker
goal.desc: Number of upgrades you have made to your place (improvements).

goal.name: Lab Rat
goal.desc: The number of little pills created in your personal laboratory.
goal.icon: The number of little pills created in your personal laboratory.

title.name: You smoke that? I made it.

goal.name: Tasty Dishes
goal.desc: The number of delicious meals you have prepared from dubious ingredients.
goal.icon: The number of delicious meals you have prepared from dubious ingredients.

goal.name: Chair à canon du FJV'08
goal.desc: Le porteur de cette marque a participé à la grande chasse organisée au Festival du Jeu Vidéo 2008.
goal.icon: Le porteur de cette marque a participé à la grande chasse organisée au Festival du Jeu Vidéo 2008.

goal.name: Geek Tracker
goal.desc: A rare distinction reserved for organisers of the Video Games festival 2008 who were at the Motion Twin stand!
goal.icon: A rare distinction reserved for organisers of the Video Games festival 2008 who were at the Motion Twin stand!

goal.name: Armageddon Witness
goal.desc: A rare distinction only awarded to thos citizens who experienced the Armageddon!
goal.icon: A rare distinction only awarded to thos citizens who experienced the Armageddon!

goal.name: Emancipation of the Shunned
goal.desc: The number of lucky finds you have stumbled across while rummaging in the town's garbage. You must be shunned to earn this distinction.
goal.icon: The number of lucky finds you have stumbled across while rummaging in the town's garbage. You must be shunned to earn this distinction.

title.name: Che Guevara of the World Beyond

goal.name: Generosity
goal.desc: The number of Hero days that you have given to another citizen in need.
goal.icon: The number of Hero days that you have given to another citizen in need.

title.name: All you need is love... and Hero days

goal.name: Clean
goal.desc: Your capacity to stay clean (take no drugs) during a lifetime
goal.icon: Your capacity to stay clean (take no drugs) during a lifetime.

goal.name: Father Christmas is a little sh*t
goal.desc: The number of presents you have stolen from your friends.

icon.name: Father Christmas is a little sh*t

goal.icon: The number of presents you have stolen from your friends.

title.name: Father Christmas is a little rascal
Old Saint Nick is a little **it
Santa Claus is a thieving b*****d
Prepare the gallows - we're hanging Santa!

goal.name: The leprechaun got you good
goal.desc: Number of your friends' items you have stolen.
goal.icon: Number of your friends' items you have stolen.

title.name: Where's my pot of gold, thieving pikey!
Burn him, see if his ashes turn green!

goal.name: Daredevil Camper
goal.desc: The number of nights you have spent in the World Beyond... and survived!
goal.icon: The number of nights you have spent in the World Beyond... and survived!

title.name: I'm allergic to something in town.
So I guess we're not waiting for Bob?
Without a roof or a tooth.

goal.name: Zen Camper
goal.desc: Number of nights survived after the town has been devastated!
goal.icon: Number of nights survived after the town has been devastated!

title.name: Neil Armstrong of the World Beyond

goal.name: Koh-Lambda Citizen
goal.desc: This citizen was involved in the Reunification (last round) of the Koh-Lambda tournament!
goal.icon: This citizen was involved in the Reunification (last round) of the Koh-Lambda tournament!

goal.name: Golden Child
goal.desc: The number of new citizens you have convinced to come to die2nite.com AND to pay for the privilege.
goal.icon: The number of new citizens you have convinced to come to die2nite.com AND to pay for the privilege.

goal.name: Video Game Festival 2010
goal.desc: You were at the Paris Video Game festival 2010: Thanks!
goal.icon: You were at the Paris Video Game festival 2010: Thanks!

goal.desc: The number of towns ranked in the top 35 of a previous season.
goal.icon: The number of towns ranked in the top 35 of a previous season.

goal.desc: Number of towns which figured in last season's rankings.
goal.icon: Number of towns which figured in last season's rankings.

goal.name: Legendary Towns!
goal.desc: Number of towns which made the number one spot from previous seasons.
goal.icon: Number of towns which made the number one spot from previous seasons.

title.name: If you want to live... Follow me!

goal.name: Sand balls!
goal.desc: Number of sand balls successfully thrown at another citizen's chevy chase.
goal.icon: "Number of sand balls successfully thrown at another citizen's chevy chase.

goal.name: Building Repairs
goal.desc: Action Points invested in the ongoing repairs of buildings.
goal.icon: Action Points invested in the ongoing repairs of buildings.

title.name: Get some Duct Tape in there.

goal.name: Community Awards
goal.desc: Rewards earned through working with the community.
goal.icon: Rewards earned through working with the community.

goal.name: Crucifiction
goal.desc: Rejoice! You don't need to walk any more.
goal.icon: Rejoice! You don't need to walk any more.

goal.name: Covert Concierge
goal.desc: The number of doors you've unlocked while exploring ruins.
goal.icon: The number of doors you've unlocked while exploring ruin

goal.desc: The number of times you've dared to go inside an abandoned ruin.
goal.icon: The number of times you've dared to go inside an abandoned ruin.

goal.desc: The number of days spent shepherding the newbs through the valleys of small maps and finding lost children.
goal.icon: The number of days spent shepherding the newbs through the valleys of small maps and finding lost children.

goal.desc: The number of dead citizens' souls collected in the World Beyond
goal.icon: The number of dead citizens' souls collected in the World Beyond

title.name: I ain't afraid of no ghost

goal.desc: The number of souls your town has managed to recycle
goal.icon: The number of souls your town has managed to recycle

goal.desc: The number of soul points you have accumulated in the course of your many lives.
goal.icon: The number of soul points you have accumulated in the course of your many lives.

goal.name: Watchman
goal.desc: The number of nights survived as a watchman.
goal.icon: The number of nights survived as a watchman.

goal.icon: Victoire en tant que Fouineur lors du Choc des Héros 2010 !

goal.desc: Gewinner des Clash Of The Titans: Survivalist
goal.icon: Awarded to the Survivalists who won the Clash of the Titans.

title.name: I am a god! I will live forever!

goal.icon: Awarded to the Shamans who won the Clash of the Titans!

goal.icon: Awarded to the Technicians who won the Clash of the Titans!

goal.desc: Gewinner des Clash Of The Titans: Scout!
goal.icon: Awarded to the Scouts who won the Clash of the Titans!

goal.name: Clash Champion
goal.desc: Gewinner des Clash Of The Titans: Tamer!
goal.icon: Awarded to the Tamers who won the Clash of the Titans!

goal.name: Clash Colossus
goal.desc: This distinction was awarded only to only one man. A man who did what he was trained to do, what he was bred to do, what he was born to do. The last man standing out of the hundreds who participated in the first Clash of the Titans: the one and only cjmUK
goal.icon: This distinction was awarded only to only one man. A man who did what he was trained to do, what he was bred to do, what he was born to do. The last man standing out of the hundreds who participated in the first Clash of the Titans: the one and only cjmUK

title.name: It is death that should be afraid of me!

goal.desc: Awarded for being part of the event team in the Clash of the Titans. Reporters, Video Makers, Town Leaders, we salute you.
goal.icon: Awarded for being part of the event team in the Clash of the Titans. Reporters, Video Makers, Town Leaders, we salute you.

goal.name: UFC
goal.desc: Honourary prize for participation in the UFC!

goal.desc: Victory in the UFC!
goal.icon: Victory during the UFC !

goal.name: Clash Titan
goal.desc: A very rare distinction, awarded only to the intrepid few who participated in the very first Clash of the Titans.
goal.icon: A very rare distinction, awarded only to the intrepid few who participated in the very first Clash of the Titans.

title.name: One town to rule them all!

goal.name: Clash CEO
goal.desc: Awarded for being one of the community organizers or developers in the Clash of the Titans. Our community thanks you!
goal.icon: Awarded to the community organizers and developers involved at the cutting edge of the Clash of the Titans. Our community thanks you!

goal.name: Good Guy
goal.desc: You are one of the most involved players in Die2Nite. For you, fair-play is more than a theory, it's a state of mind.
goal.icon: You are amongst the most upstanding players in Die2Nite. For you, fair-play is more than a theory, it's a state of mind.
